metrics.name: Invoices with immediate payment terms
metrics.description: Number of invoices where the payment terms (BSEG.ZBD1T) are 0 or NULL
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT("Last FI Invoice ID") FILTER(
	WHERE ${itp_cash_discount_terms} IS NULL
		OR ${itp_cash_discount_terms} = 0)

metrics.name: Payment Terms Differences where PO is better (Median)
metrics.description: Number of invoices for which the payment terms on the invoice differ from the payment terms on the purchase order
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG("PO Cash Discount Days 1"-"Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1") FILTER(
	WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1") 
		< (CASE WHEN "PO Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL THEN 0 
	ELSE "PO Cash Discount Days 1" END))

metrics.name: Payment Terms Differences where PO is better (Amount)
metrics.description: Number of invoices for which the payment terms on the invoice differ from the payment terms on the purchase order
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD") FILTER(
	WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1") 
		< (CASE WHEN "PO Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL THEN 0 
	ELSE "PO Cash Discount Days 1" END))

metrics.name: WC Impact of Invoices with immediate payment terms
metrics.description: Amount of invoices where the payment terms (BSEG.ZBD1T) are 0 or NULL
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD") FILTER(
	WHERE ${itp_cash_discount_terms} IS NULL
		OR ${itp_cash_discount_terms} = 0) *15*0.04/365

metricsVariables.name: itp_cash_discount_terms
metricsVariables.description: Terms that determine after which time an invoice needs to be paid, for example "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" BSEG.ZBD1t
metricsVariables.value: "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1"

metricsVariables.name: itp_purchase_order_payment_terms
metricsVariables.description: Attribute referring to the purchase order payment terms in days, for example "PO Net Payment Days"

metricsVariables.name: itp_invoice_payment_terms
metricsVariables.description: Attribute referring to the invoice payment terms in days, for example "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"
metricsVariables.value: "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1"

dashboard.name: zz_CBI - Payment Term Optimization (for Final dashboard)

children.name: Cases where PO PT is better than Invoice
Top Vendors with worse Payments Terms on their invoice

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM ("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD") 
FILTER (WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1") 
< (CASE WHEN "PO Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL THEN 0 
ELSE "PO Cash Discount Days 1" END)) AS "Payment Terms Differences where PO is better (Amount)"
,"PO Vendor Name"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT DATE_TRUNC('WEEK', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME))) AS "Week"
, SUM ("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD") 
FILTER (WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1") 
< (CASE WHEN "PO Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL THEN 0 
ELSE "PO Cash Discount Days 1" END)) AS "Payment Terms Differences where PO is better (Amount)"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('WEEK')

children.name: Immediate WC Impact grouped by PO Vendor Name

dataSource.query:
SELECT SUM ("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount Document Curr.") 
FILTER (WHERE "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL 
OR "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0) * 15 * 0.04 / 365 
AS "WC Impact of Invoices with immediate payment terms", "PO Vendor Name"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT 30

children.name: NR of Immediate Invoices over time

dataSource.query:
SELECT 


count(case_id)
--,"PO Terms of Payment Key"
,"PO Cash Discount Days 1"
--,"PO Net Payment Days"

--,"PO Vendor Master Terms of Payment Key"
,"PO Vendor Master Cash Discount Days 1"
--,"PO Vendor Master Net Payment Days"

--,"Last FI Invoice Item Terms of Payment Key"
,"Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1"
--,"Last FI Invoice Item Net Payment Days"

-- Metric: Payment Terms Differences where PO is better
,COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1") 
		< (CASE WHEN "PO Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL THEN 0 
	ELSE "PO Cash Discount Days 1" END)) 
    AS "Payment Terms better on PO"

-- Metric: 
,COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL
		OR "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0) 
    AS "Immediate Payment Terms"    

FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 desc

children.name: Vendors with immediate payment terms on their invoice but not on the PO

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"PO Vendor Name" 
,CASE 
	WHEN "PO Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 THEN 'Immediate PT on PO'
    WHEN "PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0 AND "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 THEN 'Immediate PT on Invoice but not on PO'
    WHEN "PO Vendor Master Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 THEN 'Immediate PT in Master Data'
 ELSE 'ok'
 END AS "Immediate PT behavior"
,COUNT(case_id) 
	--FILTER(WHERE "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 AND "PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0)
AS "Number of POs"  
,SUM("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD")
	--FILTER(WHERE "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 AND "PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0)
AS "Invoice Amounts" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE 
-- immediate pt on invoice but not on po
"PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0 AND "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0
 --AND "Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD" > 0
ORDER BY 3 desc

children.name: NR of Immediate Invoices despite PO not immediate

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(case_id) 
	FILTER(WHERE "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 AND "PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0)
AS "Number of POs"   
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 
SUM ("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD") 
FILTER (WHERE "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0
AND "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 AND "PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0
) * 15 * 0.04 / 365 
AS "WC Impact of Invoices with immediate payment terms"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
SELECT count("Last FI Invoice ID") FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 

COUNT ("Last FI Invoice ID") 
FILTER (WHERE "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL 
OR "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0) 
/
COUNT ("Last FI Invoice ID") 
* 100

FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 

SUM("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD")
FILTER (WHERE "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL 
OR "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0) 

FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 

SUM("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD")
FILTER (WHERE "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL 
OR "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0) 

FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 
SUM ("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD") 
FILTER (WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1") < (CASE WHEN "PO Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE "PO Cash Discount Days 1" END))
* 15 * 0.04 / 365 
AS "WC Impact of Invoices with immediate payment terms"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT count(case_id)

,"PO Item Material Number"
,"PO Item Material Text"
,"PO Item Material Group"
,"PO Item Material Group Text"
,"PO Item Quantity"
,"PO Item Unit of Measure"
,"PO Item Net Price"
,"PO Item Net Price Initial"
,"PO Item Net Order Value"
,"PO Item Net Order Value in USD"

,"PO Item Overdelivery Tolerance"
,"PO Item Underdelivery Tolerance"
,"PO Item Overdelivery Allowance"
,"PO Item Delivery Completed"
,"PO Item Acknowledge Requirement"
,"PO Item Principal Agreement Number"

,"PO Item Planned Delivery Days"
,"PO Item Last Possible Receipt"


,"Last FI Invoice Item Quantity"
,"PO Item Total Invoiced Quantity"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 desc

SELECT count(case_id)

,"PO Item Material Number"
,"PO Item Material Text"
,"PO Item Material Group"
,"PO Item Material Group Text"
,"PO Item Quantity"
,"PO Item Total Invoiced Quantity"

,"PO Item Unit of Measure"
,"PO Item Net Price"
,"PO Item Net Price Initial"
,"PO Item Net Order Value"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "PO Item Quantity" <> "PO Item Total Invoiced Quantity"
ORDER BY 1 desc

SELECT count(case_id)
,"PO Item Material Text"
,"PO Item Material Group"
,"PO Item Material Group Text"

,SUM("PO Item Net Order Value in USD") as "Net order value in $"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 desc
